resources.string: "Are you sure you want to remove this item?"
"You have reached the maximum of five settings"
"Please consider supporting me by buying the pro version"
"Click the floating action button to add an item to your Android Settings. If you want to edit an item, just click it. Long click removes the setting"
"This will launch the settings in order to get a list of all the items"
"Error while saving. Did you enter a category and did you not you enter something in both the package and fragment to launch field?"
"Clicking app icon in InstalledAppDetails activity will launch app"
"Show app package name in InstalledAppDetails activity"
"Are you sure you want to remove this category? This will also delete all the items inside this category."
"Settings Editor needs to access external storage to run correctly and to store configuration. If you deny it, you won't be able to use the app."

"Looks like you are running Android Marshmallow or higher, and that you denied some permissions. Read/Write permissions are needed to save app data and config. Please accept them or the app will not work."
"The app is ready to be used! Have fun :)"
"Change items, categories and tweak your settings!"
"Change items, categories and tweak your settings!"
"Thanks a lot for your support! You now have unlimited control of your settings!"
"This version is limited to five modifications in your settings. Try it out!"
"Error while making backup, please try again"
"Error while restoring backup, please try again"
"Are you sure you want to delete this backup?"
"Are you sure you want to restore this backup?"
"This Xposed Module doesn't seem to be activated. Please activate it to use the app"
"Application license is invalid (Error code %d). Please buy the application from the Google Play Store. If you believe this is an error, please contact me at support@wilco375.com"
"Settings Editor Pro has detected that Settings Editor is still installed. Please uninstall this app by clicking next."
"Do you want to discard all changes?"
